name: places/ChIJ9SnnYWVZwokRbgYcQCjh0_g
adrFormatAddress: 44 12th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: I came in here and the place was absolutely empty. I placed my order with the woman behind the counter and sat down, I was not charged for my order as of yet. The woman behind the desk did not give my order to the cook in the back and I was waiting for 30 minutes. A couple came in about 10 minutes after me and inquired about the status of their order. The woman was rude and mentioned that the order would be out “in a few minutes”, this was mentioned multiple times. My order as well as the couple’s order came out together and because of preexisting engagements I was left with 8 minutes to eat before having to attend a tour at the Intrepid. I arrived with more than enough time to order, receive the food, and eat. The order was chicken tenders and fries which does not take long to cook. This experience was bad enough that I decided I will not be returning here and I can only imagine the wait that they would have for the food if it was busy.

originalText.text:
Popped in for a quick bite to eat before going on one of the circle line cruises as it was the next pier. Ordered fries and mozzarella sticks to share with my other half. Food was good, hot and tasty but it took 45 minutes to be delivered to us. Wouldn’t say it was busy to warrant that amount of time. When asked the girl at bar, she deflected that it’s the kitchen staff, sorry but she’s the front of house and could have taken the 60 seconds to enquire.
Could be an amazing place as it’s in a great location for the cruises but the slow service is it let down.

originalText.text:
Unfortunately, the staff member was rude we asked for an ice cream and was blanked so waited, more fool me, she than ask what you want? We asked for an ice cream, she laughed while saying we have probably got this and that maybe but almost none of what is on the poster, so ask for an beer, sangria, two coke zero and two bags of crisps (fries) for her to only miss the cokes off the order.
The whole premises were just dirty, tables hadn't been cleaned, it was just not good.
Sorry no photo, not worth the hassle to argue why I was taking photos.

originalText.text: Worst experience ever, everything was going well until we ordered food, It took them an hour to prepare some chicken nuggets with fries and a chicken sandwich. We were enjoying a nice afternoon, we just wanted to eat something to continue enjoying ourselves.If you don't mind waiting even for a canned beer, visit it, I only recommend it to use the bathroom that is next door, clean and well equipped

originalText.text: 8 dollars for a small hot dog you can buy everywhere with 4 dollars. With these prices they are doomed to close.
